mapper.insert: insert into distance (d_id, start_id, end_id, standard_dis, standard_time) values (#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardDis,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{standardTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into distance
d_id,
start_id,
end_id,
standard_dis,
standard_time,
#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{startId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{endId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{standardDis,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{standardTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: SELECT c_address,s_address from distance,centernode,servicenode where standard_dis is NULL or standard_time is NULL limit 1;
SELECT c_id AS d_id,c_num AS startId,s_num AS endId from centernode,servicenode where c_id = #{questionId} and s_id = #{questionId};
